thread.title_full: Mark Your Calendars! 2017 Free Entrance Days For National Parks Announced

author: Hannah
title: Mark Your Calendars! 2017 Free Entrance Days For National Parks Announced

organizations.name: national parks for fourth graders this way

text:
Do you love the outdoors? The US National Park Service has announced the free entrance days for 2017 . Free entrance is available on the select dates for everyone and includes entrance fees, commercial tour fees, and transportation entrance fees.

Mark your calendars for these dates to score a free pass… January 16: Martin Luther King Jr. Day February 20: Presidents’ Day April 15-16 and 22-23: Weekends of National Park Week August 25: National Park Service Birthday September 30: National Public Lands Day November 11-12: Veterans Day Weekend 
Other fees such as reservation, camping, tours, concession and fees collected by third parties are not included unless stated otherwise. Head here for a list of the parks that normally charge an entrance fee to make the most out of this deal!
(Thanks, Carl!) 
Free Access To National Parks for Fourth Graders This Way
